name: 1v1 (Site12)
description:
This is a prototype that Shane made while procrastinating exams. Be the first to shoot the other player to win!

Press f11 to put the game in windowed mode, it starts in fullscreen.

It's got it all! One horrible placeholder map, one sniper rifle, one character that doesn't rotate properly, zero recoil, zero accuracy variation, and split-screen as well as LAN multiplayer!

Also if ur lookin to do some ONLINE play.. use Hamatchi. It lets two computers join a virtual network and you can play with your friends from afar! 

Known issues:

the lad turns weird

you gotta press the search button a couple thousand times before a match shows up

game is WAY too big :(
